# rapfiles Documentation

This directory contains comprehensive documentation for the `rapfiles` project.

## Documentation Files

### Getting Started
- **[BUILD_AND_TEST.md](BUILD_AND_TEST.md)** - Instructions for building and testing the project locally

### Project Planning
- **[ROADMAP.md](ROADMAP.md)** - Development roadmap and feature planning
- **[PHASE1_STATUS.md](PHASE1_STATUS.md)** - Phase 1 implementation status and statistics

### Release Information
- **[PYPI_RELEASE_NOTES.md](PYPI_RELEASE_NOTES.md)** - Release notes for PyPI releases
- **[RELEASE_CHECKLIST.md](RELEASE_CHECKLIST.md)** - Pre-release verification checklist

### Security
- **[SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md)** - Security policy and vulnerability reporting (in root directory)
- **[SECURITY_AUDIT.md](SECURITY_AUDIT.md)** - Security audit reports

### Testing
- **[README_TESTING.md](README_TESTING.md)** - Testing documentation and guidelines
- **[README_MIGRATED_TESTS.md](README_MIGRATED_TESTS.md)** - Documentation for migrated aiofiles tests

## Quick Links

- **Main README**: [../README.md](../README.md)
- **GitHub Repository**: https://github.com/eddiethedean/rapfiles
- **PyPI Package**: https://pypi.org/project/rapfiles/
